item.description: As he's tried to balance the memories of a decade in Indiana, Turner is embracing the other side of this heated rivalry. "[Indiana] made it very clear...

item.title: From Kyle Schwarber to Alex Bregman: Best fits for top free agents
item.description: Free agency starts Thursday at 5 p.m. ET. Here are some pairings we'd love to see as this winter gets underway.

item.title: Eagles trade for Fins' Phillips to bolster pass rush
item.description: The Eagles have acquired Jaelan Phillips in a trade with the Dolphins.

item.title: Alabama suspends DB Kirkpatrick after arrest
item.description: Alabama defensive back Dre Kirkpatrick Jr. has been suspended indefinitely following his arrest over the weekend, coach Kalen DeBoer said Monday.
